responsibilities: Overseeing a dedicated team focused on the development of a Hotel Management System project.
Coordinating closely with stakeholders, prioritizing tasks, and proactively addressing risks.
Regular client communication and feedback integration.
Mentoring team members in Agile practices and utilizing tools like JIRA for project management.
Spearheading the development of a solution aimed at testing API vulnerabilities using machine learning.
Acting as the point of contact and facilitating the production of a machine learning model for identifying SQL and XSS vulnerabilities.
Collaborating with interdisciplinary teams to integrate machine learning solutions into existing frameworks.

projects.name: YourCare
projects.description: Developed the app's frontend and backend using Firebase, set up an SMTP server for customized email functionality. The app digitizes hospital processes, enabling patients to book appointments and assisting administrators in managing hospital resources.

projects.name: Swift-Box
projects.description: Conceptualized and developed an iOS app to enhance email productivity using advanced AI algorithms for natural language processing and contextual analysis.

projects.name: Secure KYC
projects.description: Developed an online video KYC platform using Flask, Google Vision, AWS S3, AWS Rekognition, and Pillow for live photograph capture, Aadhaar verification, and signature capture.

achievements: Currently working with iOS Development Centre in collaboration with Apple to launch our app in App Store
